signals.problem_statement: The customer is unsure about the user setup and whether shared mailboxes are consuming user seats unnecessarily.
signals.customer_ask: Clarification on whether the business account needs to be a user or can just be a shared mailbox.
signals.context: Team size not specified, managing multiple inboxes.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is facing limitations in automating the classification of contacts based on their email domains.
signals.customer_ask: A way to automatically classify contacts into categories like individual inquiries and corporate inquiries.
signals.context: Managing customer inquiries and marketing outreach.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is experiencing issues with the analytics feature, specifically regarding the visibility of data due to account suspension.
signals.customer_ask: Access to analytics to track inquiries and sales.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unable to automate the export of contacts with associated tags, leading to manual work.
signals.customer_ask: An automated way to export contacts with their tags.
signals.context: Managing contact information for marketing purposes.
